name: Influencer Simulator
description:
Warning: This game is bad and buggy!

Live the Influencer Life! A game made in one week as part of a personal game jam! Snap pics, grow a following, and take dangerous selfies! Do it for the gram!

Controls: 

WASD to move

Left CTRL to enter photo mode

Left Click to take photo while in photo mode

Space to jump

Escape to peep the gram
